episodes.title: Kenyan Court Orders New Exhumations in Suspected Cult Case | #AfricaWorldHour
episodes.description:
A Kenyan court has ordered the exhumation of more suspected cult victims near Malindi, Kilifi County - the same region where over 400 bodies were discovered in Shakahola Forest in 2024. What does this mean for justice and accountability in Kenya?

Channel Africa correspondent Alex Kiarie joins Thabiso Lehoko on Africa World Hour to unpack the latest developments in this disturbing case.

📍 Stay informed. Subscribe for more in-depth reporting from across the continent.
